<h3 id="X26884">X(26884) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-CONWAY AND INNER-HUTSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^4-(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b-c)^2*b*c)  :  :
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(11685)</p>
<p>X(26884) lies on these lines:
{1,5197}, {2,3955}, {7,17985}, {9,5651}, {22,3784}, {25,222}, {28,60}, {31,56}, {34,7335}, {48,8763}, {51,2003}, {57,184}, {63,9306}, {84,26883}, {105,2720}, {110,2651}, {141,26924}, {182,3306}, {199,22097}, {206,26923}, {212,4191}, {219,6090}, {243,23353}, {244,1428}, {255,13738}, {354,20986}, {394,26893}, {450,1948}, {468,26932}, {511,22128}, {614,1397}, {649,834}, {692,1155}, {750,2330}, {851,1936}, {953,4588}, {1086,5137}, {1092,5709}, {1104,1408}, {1385,1621}, {1393,19365}, {1401,5322}, {1458,20999}, {1474,14597}, {1495,3220}, {1498,26927}, {1503,26933}, {1614,26877}, {1709,15503}, {1851,18623}, {1899,20266}, {1935,13724}, {1974,7289}, {2187,9316}, {2249,2727}, {2267,16373}, {2323,3292}, {2328,22060}, {2360,22345}, {2361,20470}, {2915,11573}, {2969,6357}, {3011,5061}, {3145,4303}, {3781,15066}, {3819,5314}, {3912,17977}, {3917,5285}, {4224,17074}, {4579,5205}, {4871,5150}, {6353,26871}, {7004,10535}, {7085,17811}, {8679,20989}, {9225,16514}, {9544,23958}, {10536,26934}, {10539,24467}, {11206,26929}, {13329,23202}, {13737,23072}, {14530,26928}, {16064,22053}, {18360,23844}, {20744,20857}, {22129,24320}, {26864,26866}, {26880,26900}, {26881,26910}, {26882,26914}, {26886,26930}, {26887,26931}</p>
<p>
X(26884) = isogonal conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(5088)<br>
X(26884) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 3955, 26890), (25, 222, 26892)<br>
</p>
